title: Ronnie on His EVOO 29er Riding Mt Hood’s Glade Trail
content:
Our buddy Kyle von Hoetzendorff just shared with us a video of Ronnie “Smooth Operator” Romance riding the Glade Trail on Mount Hood aboard his EVOO. We thought you’d enjoy.

The post Ronnie on His EVOO 29er Riding Mt Hood’s Glade Trail appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
